text: Justin Marie Bomboko (22 September 1915 - 10 April 2014) was a Congolese civil servant. He was the Minister of Foreign Affairs for the Congo. He became minister in 1960. He is often called "The Father of Independence" for the Congolese. Bomboko died from a long illness in Brussels, Belgium, aged 98. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:African politicians Category:Civil servants Category:Disease-related deaths in Belgium
